summary: Lightbulbs, fire, barbed wire, mousetraps, staple guns, thumbtacks and glass are weapons of choice in The Backyard. This undercover documentary takes you deep into the controversial arena ... See full summary »
cast: Paul Hough|The Lizard|Mario Ponce|Chaos|Heartless|Bongo|Nympho|The Retarded Butcher|Paulson Ryan Scott|Sic|Rob Van Dam|James Weston
title: The Backyard
